snippet: Books on the life of Lorenz Hart, the character of Williamsburg, Brooklyn, and Judge Frederic Block, 78, who still hears cases as a senior judge in Federal District Court for the Eastern District.
abstract: Sam Roberts reviews books A Ship Without a Sail: The Life of Lorenz Hart by Gary Marmorstein, The Last Bohemia by Robert Anasi and autobiography Disrobed: An Inside Look at the Life and Work of a Federal Trial Judge by Frederic Block.
lead_paragraph: Books on the life of Lorenz Hart, the character of Williamsburg, Brooklyn, and Judge Frederic Block, 78, who still hears cases as a senior judge in Federal District Court for the Eastern District.

headline.print_headline: Exploring a Lyricist and a Brooklyn ‘Bohemia’
headline.seo: Books About Lorenz Hart, a Federal Judge and Williamsburg, Brooklyn
headline.main: Exploring a Lyricist and a Brooklyn ‘Bohemia’
